Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 94th overall pick, by Penn in 1969...
Injured on 8/22/1973 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Injured on 8/29/1973 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/24/1974, off Richard Rummel (CC)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/1974, off Walter Morning (Ash)...
Won World Championship with Penn in 1974...
Injured on 5/17/1979 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/13/1980 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 5/10/1984 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
